LAN._comment3: port - The internal port the service is listening on

SSL._comment1_1: bUseSSL - Boolean value that enable/disables SSL. NOTE: Set to false ONLY if testing using localhost

WAN._comment4_1: host - The public hostname of your server
WAN._comment4_2: port - The public port mapped to your service. Frequently this is the same as your LAN port

MVSF._comment5_1: key - Admin Key to allow user to modify the Map
